"Prepared for: Inter-Departmental Committee: Alberta Forestry, Land & Wildlife; Alberta Tourism; Alberta Recreation and Parks; Alberta Environment; Alberta Cultural and Multiculturalism; Alberta Transportation and Utilities; Northern Alberta Development Council"
"This study was conducted by IMC Consulting Group Inc."--Preface
V. 1. Study -- v.2. Appendices -- v.3. Executive summary

This study of the possibilities for developing the tourism industry in northern Alberta was undertaken in order to measure the current status of commercial recreation, to determine where current and future opportunities exist and to develop recommendations aimed at stimulating positive growth of this economic sector. Categories studied include motels, lodges, cabins, fly-in camps for fishing and hunting, water and mountain-based activities
